Name: absorption chiller production, 100kW | absorption chiller, 100kW | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2819:Manufacture of other general-purpose machinery
Description: Single stage absorption chiller with water-ammonia cycle and 100 kW cooling capacity connected to a 250 kW hybrid air cooler. The unit includes 40m of piping between the chiller and the air cooler. Coefficient of performance between 0.4 and 0.7 depending on supply temperatures.
